DOC.brief_summary: We investigate impact probiotic-based dietary supplement oxidative stress endotoxemia strenuous exercise . Hypotheses ( H1 ) : - Supplementation influence oxidative stress parameter post exercise - Supplementation influence parameter endotoxemia inflammation post exercise - Strenuous exercise influence parameter oxidative stress , inflammation endotoxemia
DOC.criteria: train men 30 45 year nonsmokers 4wk wash dietary supplement untrained people ( VO2max < 55 ml x kg1 ) female people match age group smoker men take dietary supplement men fail ergometric exercise eligibility testing , refer standard sport medicine ( e.g . : significant STdecrease increase , blood pressure > 240 mmHg , tachycardia , polymorphic extrasystolia , cyanosis , bradyarrhythmia.. ) people adjudge `` Healthy ''
